sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./StyleSheets/JobPostingCard.css"; // Custom CSS for the job posting card function JobCard({ jobPosting ,key}) { const { role, companyName, location, salary , requirement ,description } = jobPosting; return ( <>
{role}

Company: {companyName}
Location: {location}
Salary: {salary} per annum

Apply Now

Job Description:
{description}

Requirements: {requirement.map((req, index) => (
{req} ))}

); } export default JobCard;
